body.name: Leotachi 21.5 inch Touch Screen Mirror IP66 Waterproof TV for Bathroom Shower - Support 360° Rotation, 500 nits High Brightness Full HD 1080P LED Built-in Android OS WiFi/LAN/USB/BT/HDMI(Silver)
body.stockDetail: Only 10 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 1 min
features: 【Dual Interface】 Leotachi bathroom TV can choose one of the display interfaces: mBox and Smart mirror. mBox uses the familiar Android phone interface, easy to operate; Smart mirror focuses on displaying and recording your health instrument data, such as skin analyzers, scales, sleep monitors, etc (needs to be purchased additionally). TV has pre-installed off icial genuine APP (such as Netflix, YouTube, Google browser, etc.), you can also download and install your favorite APP on Google Play.

【Control Method】Support 10 fingers touch screen technology, such as two fingers to zoom in on pictures and other complex operations. we are also equipped with two remote controls, IP68 waterproof remote control also supports cursor control, you can control the cursor flexibly like a mouse in the TV. Equipped with Android 11.0 system, Resolution 1920*1080, 500nits high brightness to enhance user experience. External wifi antenna to improve signal receiving ability.

【Multiple Installation Methods】Leotachi TV comes with a wall bracket (only Support TV horizontal screen hanging), you can choose to install it embedded in the wall or against the wall according to your scene. The special feature of Leotachi is that it supports rotating the screen by 360°. You can also choose a 360° rotating floor stand with wheels (additional purchase required), so you can use Leotachi TV anywhere. Note that the load-bearing capacity of the bracket must be greater than 5kg.

【Safe To Use】Leotachi TV has IP66 professional waterproof rating, 12v DC voltage power supply, no harm to the human body, no need to consider the problem of leakage. in line with household and commercial conditions, Designed for use in wet areas such as bathrooms, kitchens,jacuzzis and swimming pools, boats,yachts,sauna,salon,spa,hotel,steam rooms, etc; The surface of the waterproof TV adopts a full mirror design, which is exactly the same as a mirror when the power is off.

【Worry-free after-sales service】We have a one-year warranty, if you encounter any problems, please contact leotachi customer service directly, we will reply within 24 hours; Support interfaces: Audio output*1/Lan*1/USB*2/DC12v *1/HDMI*1., HDMI interface allows you to use the Leotachi TV Compatible with other media devices. such as TV box, Computers, various game consoles; USB interface supports extended functions such as file transfer and external camera. Explore more possibilities.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Leotachi Smart Waterproof Touch Screen Mirror TV for Bathroom Touch Screen and IP68 Waterproof Remote Control (Double Control)Dual system interface, to meet the needs of different scenarios, in line with the preferences of more people.Screen Support 360° Rotation（Purchase an extra 360° swivel floor stand to keep the leotachi TV by your side at all times.）Automatic Defogging Function (only work when the TV is playing)

Leotachi Waterproof Touch Screen Mirror TV for Bathroom Overall Size 515(W)*312(H)*36(D)mm / 23.7 inch Screen Size 476(W)-268(D)mm / 21.5 inch Weight 5.5KG Waterproof grade IP66 Display Screen Rotation Supports 360° rotation (Find us and get the latest upgrade package) Control Method 10-point touch screen and Remote Control Operating System Android 11.0 Interface Audio Output *1 / LAN *1 / USB*2 / DV12V*1 / HDMI *1 Screen Brightness 500nits Speaker 10Ω, 10W*2 power Supply 60W (standby≤1W) Plugs and power supplies NEMA 5-15 plug; DC 12V / 5A Output; Working Temperature -40 ~76°C Package includes Mirror TV*1, Remote control (batteries not included)*2, Wall bracket*1, Product Manuals*1, Power Adapter*1

Get a smart mirror and smart TV at the same price It's a high-performance smart TV Smart TV with Android 11.0 and pre-installed official apps (Netflix, YouTube, and Google browser.ect). You can download more apps from Google Play or APKPure. Enjoy a wide range of entertainment options on your smart TV, including movies, news, games, cooking, makeup videos, and music... It's also a luxurious high-definition mirror. Switch to high-definition mirror mode with just one click on the screen. Our high-definition mirror features high-quality glass material, ensuring no color cast and minimizing multiple reflections. Experience the luxury of our mirrors and enhance the beauty of your bathroom.

Dual system interface mBox Classic Android operation interface, easy to use.You can set 5 commonly used APPs on the homepage.Most of the apps you need can be downloaded from the Google Play Store, such as movie, music, news, chat, weather, and home device control apps, among others. Smart Mirror Focus on recording your physical condition and generate weekly/monthly/yearly reports in time, regardless of body data fluctuations. Such as skin analyzers, scales, sleep monitors and many other types of smart devices. (Compatible with some brands and models)

Two Control Modes Touch Screen 10-point advanced touch screen control supports complex finger commands, such as zooming in on the screen with two fingers. The response is ultra-sensitive and the operation is more convenient. Remote Control Leotachi TV comes with an IP68 waterproof remote control and a non-waterproof remote control to give you more space to use. Using infrared to control the TV, you can control the TV from a distance without moving around.

Two screen display directions Horizontal screen Landscape screen, 1080P HD for immersive viewing of your favorite movies or game shows. Vertical screen The vertical screen has a perfect ratio of 9:16, which fits your mobile phone viewing habits. It is equipped with a rotating stand to enhance the use experience. (Package does not include rotating stand)
Previous page No wall drilling needed. 98" cord for flexible socket placement. Next page 1 Installation 2 Recommended Installation

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful on my bathroom wall
reviews.reviewText: Overall good product, however its a little hard to navigate. I'd compare it to an advanced computer. If you are tech savvy its great. If you are not so tech oriented you may want to look for a more simple device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Don’t purchase it doesn’t work I returned and they kept my money and the tv. Run run run people
